channel.title: Compile Help!
channel.description:
i need help i compile file ang give me these error
[table][tr][td]'javac' não é reconhecido como um comando interno ou externo, programa operacional ou ficheiro batch. Prima qualquer tecla para continuar . . .[/td][/tr][/table]

item.title: Compile Help!
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

replace the compiler code with this:

javac *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Help!
item.dc:creator: @1g0r 1g0r
item.description:
@1g0r wrote:

Compiler code

@echo off
COLOR f1

title bestscape Compiler
javac -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java
pause

jdk version 1.6.0_04

error give

’ javac ’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operational program or filing-cabinet batch. Cousin any keyboard key to continue. . .

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Help!
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

would help if that was in english, but i can kinda understand what it means. what JDK version do you have? and what does your compiler say?

Read full topic
